text:
Hi team,

Can we integrate HubSpot with Skype for calling and messaging from HubSpot?
Please suggest the steps.

Thanks,

You’d probably need to build a proprietary integration using <https://www.skype.com/en/developer/|https://www.skype.com/en/developer/> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/calling-sdk|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/calling-sdk> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/meetings|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/meetings>

Can someone at HubSpot
remove the console log from web-interactives-embed (New HTML embed CTAs js)
And also fix the 404 error when your logged in? - > It seems to be checking to see if your using a local dev server (I assume it’s an internal HubSpot thing?)
“<http://localhost:1442/check-if-local-dev-server>”

obviously if you are not it 404's there’s got to be a better solution

It’s just one of those annoying things, I like to keep my console clean and error free :mild-panic-intensifies:

Thank you so much :slightly_smiling_face:  <@U05UPMU10SE> for your response.
Let me try this one.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

:rocket: *[Developer Project Platform Version 2023.2 Release in Public Beta]* :rocket:

Hello fellow developers! We are happy to announce the release of <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/developer-projects-platform-version-2023.2|Project Platform Version 2023.2>, the first version for the new <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/platform-versioning|versioning mechanism> that we are implementing for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-a-project|Developer Projects>. Users can now easily update their software to new platform versions containing the latest changes, rollback to previous versions, and manage any breaking changes in a more coordinated fashion. :developers-developers-developers:

Platform version 2023.2 includes the following new features:

• *Support for asynchronous functions for App Functions (Async Await support)*
• *Removal of 4KB limits for CRM card logs and integration with an improved logging system* that will enable log tracing feature for CRM custom cards in the near future (_coming soon!_)
• *Control Node version through platform version (v2023.2 will point to Node 18)* - Simply update your platform version to get the latest Node version!
• *Endpoint function deprecation for CMS Projects* - App Functions will replace Endpoint Functions for Projects
• *JSON custom card deprecation* - You will no longer be able to use JSON cards for v2023.2 (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/upcoming-sunset-json-custom-cards|sunset announcement>). Instead, you'll need to update to React custom cards.
Simply update your platform version to 2023.2 following the instructions in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/platform-versioning|Project Platform Versioning> documentation to get access to these features. The previous platform version (2023.1) is on path to deprecation on March 2024.

You can refer to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/developer-projects-platform-version-2023.2|changelog announcement> and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/platform-versioning|Project Platform Versioning> documentation for more details and instructions! :sprocket-dance:

Hi developers! I have been trying to submit my new theme, and I am encountering an issue with background images for sections. Here is a code I have. ```{% dnd_section background_image={ "background_position" : "MIDDLE_CENTER", "background_size" : "cover", "image_url" : "" }, full_width=false %} {% dnd_column offset=0, width=12, padding={ "default" : { "left" : "0px", "right" : "0px" } } %} {% dnd_row %} {% dnd_module path="@HubSpot/rich_text", offset=0, width=12 %} {% module_attribute "html" %}

Short heading here

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse varius enim in eros elementum tristique. Duis cursus, mi quis viverra ornare, eros dolor interdum nulla, ut commodo diam libero vitae erat.

{% end_module_attribute %} {% end_dnd_module %} {% end_dnd_row %} {% end_dnd_column %} {% end_dnd_section %}``` I have seen some documentation online as well that to apply the background image, you use a bit of different syntax. I tried this code with that syntax. `{% dnd_section` `background_image = {` `"backgroundPosition": "MIDDLE_CENTER",` `"backgroundSize": "cover",` `"imageUrl": ""` `},` `full_width=false` `%}` `{% dnd_column` `offset=0,` `width=12` `%}` `{% dnd_row %}` `{% dnd_module` `path="@HubSpot/rich_text",` `offset=0,` `width=12` `%}` `{% module_attribute "html" %}` `

Short heading here

` `

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse varius enim in eros elementum tristique. Duis cursus, mi quis viverra ornare, eros dolor interdum nulla, ut commodo diam libero vitae erat.

` `{% end_module_attribute %}` `{% end_dnd_module %}` `{% end_dnd_row %}` `{% end_dnd_column %}` `{% end_dnd_section %}` The background image will not display either way. I have also just tried creating new sections with a background images in the page editor, then HUBL in developer mode and it does not work either. What is the problem here?

Hello developers,
I am trying to create a company and a contact from <https://segment.com/|segment> using cloud mode(actions) as a destination.
Is the only way to achieve this in segment is through upsert company with associate contact set to true. And make sure that the upsert contact is called befioe this event is action is triggered?

I am doing this, but I get the following error:

```"body": {
      "category": "OBJECT_NOT_FOUND",
      "context": {
        "id": [
          "157001"
        ],
        "objectType": [
          "contact"
        ]
      },
      "correlationId": "e6088318-84cd-4f7f-9fdf-0e56fd23de93",
      "message": "No contact with ID 157001 exists",
      "status": "error",
      "subCategory": "crm.associations.TO_OBJECT_NOT_FOUND"
    },```
Now I am not the one setting the id "157001".
Has anyone been able to do  this successfully?
Would appreciate any help. Thank you.
